name: Flames of the End
description:
A grid-based tactics game prototype for my grad school application.

Humanity is on the brink of destruction, as endless hordes of monsters have been unleashed from Hell. Only Prince Anis has the magical might to cast a spell that can drive the creatures back from whence they came. Only a few heroes remain to defend the prince against the encroaching darkness. Will they be up to the challenge?

Asset Sources

Character Portraits:

https://opengameart.org/content/32x32-fantasy-portrait-set

Ability Icons:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/free-rpg-fantasy-spell-icons-...

Tilemaps:

https://opengameart.org/content/2d-lost-garden-zelda-style-tiles-resized-to-32x3...

https://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-grassland-tileset

Music:

https://opengameart.org/content/battle-in-the-winter

UI:

https://crusenho.itch.io/complete-gui-essential-pack

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/dark-brown-gui-kit-201086

All programming and design were done by me.
